title: How to Cut a Lemon Half with a Knot

steps.headline: Cut a very thin layer off the base of the lemon half.
steps.description: This is to enable the lemon half to sit unaided.

steps.headline: Cut around most of the top edge of the lemon half:
steps.description: Use a paring knife or citrus cutter to peel away a small 5mm/ ⁄4 inch (0.6 cm) strip of lemon peel from the top edge of the lemon half. While cutting, angle the knife or cutter slightly inward. Don't cut the whole way––leave the peeled strip intact when you reach the other side of the circle.

steps.headline: Tie the strip into a neat knot.
steps.description: Curl the peel around and make the knot as for any knot. Don't pull it tight––leave a large loop above the knot, sticking into the air above the lemon half. The loose end should be neatly tucked below the lower half of the knot. The end result looks like half a vertically tied shoelace.

steps.headline: Done.
steps.description: The garnish is now ready to add to a plate for display and use on the food. Repeat as many times as needed for the remaining lemon halves you wish to use.

text: Cut the lemon in half.  Cut a very thin layer off the base of the lemon half. This is to enable the lemon half to sit unaided. Cut around most of the top edge of the lemon half: Use a paring knife or citrus cutter to peel away a small 5mm/ ⁄4 inch (0.6 cm) strip of lemon peel from the top edge of the lemon half. While cutting, angle the knife or cutter slightly inward. Don't cut the whole way––leave the peeled strip intact when you reach the other side of the circle. Tie the strip into a neat knot. Curl the peel around and make the knot as for any knot. Don't pull it tight––leave a large loop above the knot, sticking into the air above the lemon half. The loose end should be neatly tucked below the lower half of the knot. The end result looks like half a vertically tied shoelace. Done. The garnish is now ready to add to a plate for display and use on the food. Repeat as many times as needed for the remaining lemon halves you wish to use.
